Business Partnering and Strategic HR Advisory:  
• Strategic stakeholder management and Advisory to the Business Areas –, 
Energy Systems, Oil&Gas, Maritim e services, Business Assurance and Digital 
Solutions  
• Engaging Senior Management by providing expert advice, coaching and 
support on full range of HR activities (including policies and procedures, terms 
and conditions of employment , restructuring of serv ices, performance 
management, redundancy planning.  
• Establishes effective resourcing, mobility, development, succession and 
retention plans for leadership teams / key roles across, Influence talent, 
performance and mobility decisions  
• In consultation wit h the HQ the implementation and roll out of standardized 
services as per Service Level Agreements  
• Oversees cultural transformation, organization design and change 
management post -merger and support business in enhancement of employee 
engagement, implement ation of diversity initiatives, and ensure culture of 
ethical behaviour at an individual and collective level.  
• Review and implementation of HR Policies, OPs and procedures for Middle 
East and North Afric a 
 
Talent Acquisition, Management of Assessment cen ters and Employer 
Branding:  
• Manpower planning and Strategic alignment with the BAs  
• Managing talent acquisition activities and campaigns for IMEA within agreed 
KPIs  
• Driving Graduate recruitment programs in collaboration with the top universities 
in the Region  
• Using various reporting tools, such as Power Bi, Glassdoor analytics, iCIMS 
dashboard and reporting to forecast, analyse and adopt appropriate set of 
actions to increase brand visibility and Diversi ty & Inclusion.  
• Successful management of asses sment centers in India and the ME, Cut -e 
certified, psychometric test administration and feedback session  
• Active headhunting of the passive talent via social platforms and other 
networking events

• Overlooking international Long -term, short -term, rotation and training 
assignments  
• Mobilization and repatriation of Assignees in the region  
 
Grievance Management:  
• Consult Line Managers and employees with disciplinary and grievance cases 
in line wit h established legislations  
• Manage investigations and effectively handle disciplinary and grievance 
matters  
• Facilitate an optimum viable solution to support the business

and development of the Nationals, Employer branding activities for Nationals

• Effective team managemen
